  • Constructor Details

    • Refrigerator

      public Refrigerator()

    • Refrigerator

      public Refrigerator(double weight, double width, double height, double depth, int powerConsumption, double freezerCapacityInLiters, double overallCapacityInLiters)
      Constructor with parameters. Params can not be negative.
      Parameters:
      weight - Weight of an appliance, preferably in kilos.
      width - Width of an appliance, preferably in cm.
      height - Height of an appliance, preferably in cm.
      depth - Depth of an appliance, preferably in cm.
      powerConsumption - Power consumption of an appliance, preferably in watt.
      freezerCapacityInLiters - Capacity of a freezer, in liters. Cannot be greater than overall capacity.
      overallCapacityInLiters - Overall of a refrigerator, in liters. Cannot be greater than total volume.

  • Method Details

    • getFreezerCapacityInLiters

      public double getFreezerCapacityInLiters()

    • setFreezerCapacityInLiters

      public void setFreezerCapacityInLiters(double freezerCapacityInLiters)
      Mutator for freezer capacity.
      Parameters:
      freezerCapacityInLiters - New capacity of a freezer. Cannot be negative or greater than overall capacity.

    • getOverallCapacityInLiters

      public double getOverallCapacityInLiters()

    • setOverallCapacityInLiters

      public void setOverallCapacityInLiters(double overallCapacityInLiters)
      Mutator for overall capacity.
      Parameters:
      overallCapacityInLiters - New overall capacity of a refrigerator. Cannot be negative, less than freezer capacity, or greater than total volume.
